com.robix.nexway.event
Class ServoEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.robix.nexway.event.PodEvent
          com.robix.nexway.event.ServoEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ServoEvent
extends PodEvent

An event used to notify listeners that a servo property's value has changed.

See Also:
PodEventGen, ServoProperty, Serialized Form
